title: How do I find my API key for Unity ads?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I am trying to generate stats reports for my game and need to find my API key.

sections.title: Cause
content: You are looking to acquire your API key in order to generate Monetization Stats.

sections.title: Resolution
content: 1. Go to and log in to your Ads Dashboard.
3. Copy the API key to your clipboard or click "Generate new key".

sections.title: More Information
content: How Do I Generate Stats Reports For My Games
